Banner.Description: I'm interested in Full Stack Development, Data Science and AI/ML technologies
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: I'm an incoming grad student at Syracuse University and a software engineer with 3+ years of experience developing full-stack solutions. I'm interested in web development, data science and AI/ML technologies. I am dedicated to writing clean, scalable and reusable code, following best practices and standards.
I completed my Bachelor's in Engineering in Information Technology from University of Mumbai, India and since then I have been working with TCS as a software engineer.
My interests lies in building beautiful applications and creating scalable solutions.
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: System Engineer
Description: Developing backednd middleware using microservices architectures using Rest APIs and Spring Boot
Led the development of invoice processing automation system using Python Django for backend Rest APIs, UiPath for on-screen processing and Azure AI Vision/ Document Intelligence for OCR
Created a Java-based module for report delivery by generating automated mails
Built and integrated high-performance, re-usable web components using Angular Material

Experience.Jobs.Title: Web Development Intern
Description: Developed a feature for an e-commerce application using Node.js as a backend framework and MongoDB for data storage.
Created and integrated webpages for e-commerce website using Angular to enhance user experience

FeatureProjects.Title: My Projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Highlighted Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Sentimental Analysis of Drug Reviews
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Created scripts for scraping the data from web to create a drug review database. Conducted emotional analysis on the data to understand the drug effectiveness by training it using Recurrent Neural Network algorithms.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Super Store Dashboard
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Dashboard for tracking the store performance based on various parameters. It provides feature like analysis of region-wise profits, most profitable items and employee performance

OtherProjects.Title: Skills

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Languages
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Extended rock-paper-scissors game. A personal project developed in Angular where you play randomly against the machine. It features the use of services, interfaces, and components.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Technologies & Frameworks
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Interface that consumes a countries API where you can view a list of countries, see details of each country, filter by name and region. It also has a dark mode to switch between dark and light themes.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Applications
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A single page with a minimalist design listing 4 features in 4 cards. Entry animations are used with Angular animations.

Contact.Title: Say Hi!
Contact.Content: I woul love to connect and collaborate with you.
